about_the_game:
The Cows Are Coming Home

Defend the earth from an invasion of angry moo-tant cattle from another world!

An unknown force is abducting our livestock and transforming them into an army of mutant super soldiers! In this whimsically wild platformer sh'mup, farmers all across the countryside need your help to stave off the crowd of cosmic cattle descending upon the earth. Take on the role of our brave hero and eliminate the harrowing herds of heifers with an explosive arsenal of armaments and abilities. Supply your stockpile by seizing arms from the invasion force, and then unleash your weapons of moo destruction at the most fearsome boss cows on the range!

Do you have what it takes to put this platoon out to pasture?

The Beefarena

  • Arcade Mode
    Battle a Cambrian explosion of alien cattle through over 100 arenas to thwart the alien plot. Go it alone, or bring a friend and play co-op!

  • Survival Mode
    When you're finished with the first wave, battle through a random assortment of veteran arenas in Survival Mode-- but once you die its all over!

  • Challenge Mode
    Climb the leaderboards in a collection of hand picked scenarios that will test your abilities and show off your beefiest achievements

Find Your Weapon of Choice

Choose a weapon from any of the dozens of weapons you'll pick up from your foes. Whether you want to frag your enemies with the grenade launcher, or get up and close and personal with the sword, Beefarena has a weapon to fit your needs. 

Expand Your Firepower

Collect and curate an inventory of powerful items collected from the battlefield to improve your chances in battle. An expansive set of possible upgrades will help you do more damage, fire faster, create larger explosions, and much more!

Play with Friends

Just like the single screen platformers of yore, Beefarena will have local co-op, connect another controller and a friend can jump into arcade mode at any time!

Beefarena will be released in early 2025
